1553322222221222222221221.title: Musical Chairs

15533222222212222222212211.content:
Xiawuchi was not a happy termite.

You wouldn't be either or everything you knew and loved was violently ripped from you within barely a minute's notice. Xiawuchi and his family and friends were a rare species of Equestrian termite that made their homes within the musical instruments that ponies liked to play. Xiawuchi was one such termite in a colony within a cello inside one of Canterlot's finest musical emporiums. It was a peaceful life, they stayed away from ponies. The cello was priceless, so they figured it would never be sold.

Of course, the ponies didn't know that Xiawuchi and the others had achieved sentience, that they were just as entitled to life and civil rights as those who were much bigger than they.

Anyway, one day the cello WAS purchased atop the music store's shelves. An elegant grey Earth pony mare was in search for a new cello, and apparently she had a love of expensive, ancient baubles. From that point on, Xiawuchi and his friends had their home moved, to a small house within the town of Ponyville, where the mare and her loud roommate lived.

Before that, Xiawuchi would have never said that he hated ponykind. From that point on, he would grow to despise the big ones, but more importantly, he especially loathed the demoness known as Octavia.

Octavia... it would go down in the colony as a name to whisper to little larva when they misbehaved. That is, if there was even a colony anymore, which there wasn't.

Octavia HATED bugs, and she especially hated bugs that infested her cello, as she found out the day she brought the cello home. Xiawuchi still remembered the titanic grey face looking in, followed by the ear-splitting scream of fear and disgust.

From that point on, one-third of the colony was squashed underneath her hooves. His parents, and most of his brothers and sisters survived, but Octavia would have her house fumigated a mere days later, taking the rest of the colony with it.

Xiawuchi just barely managed to escape the house, huddling up within an enclave in Octavia and Vinyl's lawn.

"Revenge..." he muttered.

"What was that, Xiawuchi?" a peppy female voice said. His friend Atalia the Ant waddled up to him drawing in the dirt, the cool blades of grass shading them.

The local ant colony had taken him in when he had nowhere else to go. They, and another termite colony had helped him get back on his feet, all six of them.

"Revenge... I told you before, Atalia. I'm just about to launch my attack on the grey demon..." Xiawuchi said, his pincers morphing into a smile. Atalia cocked her head.

"Revenge... but those ponies are like a million times bigger than we are..."

"Trust me, I think I'm onto a breakthrough..." he said, finishing the drawing in the dirt. Upon closer inspection, it was more like a blueprint. There were several diagrams of other insects.

"Well, the queen said that she'll support you in any way. We don't want to get fumigated either, but we don't want to be lead into a death trap, either. When does this plan of yours go underway?"

Xiawuchi grinned.

"Tonight. If her precious music means so much that she'll wipe us all out, we'll see what music sounds like after we're done with her..." Xiawuchi said.
15533222222212222222212211.title: A Termite's Revenge*

155332222222122222222122111.content:
Anna, the Ant Queen stared at Xiawuchi the termite in shock. She was almost unable to comprehend what he had just said. When the lone termite asked to have an audience with her about betting revenge on the pony-god Octavia, she had been expecting him to be mad with rage and asking for a full scale assault. She had been ready for this and was also ready to deny the request while also talking Xiawuchi down in favor of another plan. This was not what had happened.

"I'm sorry my friend. Can you repeat that?" She asked nervously, hoping she had misheard the request.

Xiawuchi nodded. "I formally request your permission to take two, maybe three small teams of your soldiers on a mission to infiltrate Octavia and Vinyl Scratch's home. We will invade the target's ears and, depending on how she reacts, force her to work for the restoration of my clan or to destroy her hearing for good."

The calm way in which the termite spoke tricked most of the assembled ants and other termites to think he was trying for the most peaceful method of attack. Queen Anna and the Termite Queen of the neighbor clan, Samara knew different. They both exchanged glances at the other. The was no peace in Xiawuchi's eyes. He chose this plan both to limit the possible casualties and to force Octavia into one of two forms of torture. Serving the bugs she so feared, or losing the most important thing to her as a musician, her hearing.

Queen Samara spoke first. "And what of the other team, the third one? I'm assuming the first two teams will be used to infiltrate both ears. What is the third team to do?"

Xiawuchi bowed in respect to Samara. "You are correct, my queen. The first two will be for Octavia's ears. The third team will invade Vinyl Scratch, her house mate. Should Octavia try to gain help from Vinyl during our attack, the third team will be in place to remove the unicorn as a threat. We can also use her another method to keep Octavia under control."

Samara and Anna looked to each other as Xiawuchi finished his plan. They both agreed, it was brilliant. With such small numbers they could avoid the casualties they had feared would result from a head on attack with Octavia and the plan actually bypassed direct fighting and put Octavia into a position where she would have to obey their demands or be rendered deaf for life. It was cruel, wicked, near evil and most of all...Their best chance to win without deaths on their side. Anna looked back to Xiawuchi.

"Xiawuchi. Are you prepared to lead this plan?"

"Yes." He spoke without pause or uncertainty.



(Later that night, in Octavia and Vinyl's house)

Both Octavia and Vinyl were in bed, sleeping soundly under Luna's moon. Neither of them saw the line of ant and termite soldiers climbing up their sheets to begin Xiawuchi's plan...
155332222222122222222122111.title: A plan is formed*

1553322222221222222221221111.content:
"Xiawuchi, are you sure about this?" Atalia told him. The Queens Anna and Samara had chosen her to lead the Third Battalion of bugs, with Xiawuchi rounding out the First.

She was honestly worried for her friend. Xiawuchi was not a torture technician by nature, and he had come up with such a cold-blooded plan. When they first found him, he was meek. Traumatized, in a way. Months of hatred and resentment had festered inside him.

"I'm positive. This is the best course of action to take back our homes and lives. Anyway, Atalia, what are you still doing here? I'll be entering the left ear of Octavia with my squadron, but you are assigned to go to Vinyl Scratch." he said, noticing that Atalia's squad were waiting for her on the white unicorn's bed.

"I'm going now. They appear to be ready. Just... don't lose yourself, Xiawuchi..." she said, before wandering off, scurrying down Octavia's bed post.

They were at the middle of the sheets, ready to enter. The grey Earth pony had a frown on her face as she slept, at least that was what he tell from this distance.

He had one-thousand ants and five-hundred termites underneath his command, a standard squad size for each type of colony.

"Alright, let's march!"

Forming into a single file line that when put together would only cover about a foot total, the column of insects marched with Xiawuchi at the head.

Octavia did not stir, which was fortunate because she could crush all of them in one fell swoop. Luckily, she was lying upon her back, her ears pressed into the pillow. From their vantage point, they would have easy access. Xiawuchi imagined that the Second Battalion was doing something similar on the other side.

Pretty soon, Xiawuchi found himself at the entrance to a grey, dark, and slightly moist cavern. Octavia's ear twitched slightly, reminding him that the cave was alive.

He stepped onto the ridge and moved into the pony's ear, the single file line coming directly behind him. It would take almost ten minutes for the last ant to enter, but Octavia didn't stir.

The ceiling hung high above them, grey hairs covering both it and the floor. He moved past, ready to start the plan.
1553322222221222222221221111.title: Operation: Infect*

1553322222221222222222.content: Well...perhaps some villains of course?
1553322222221222222222.title: Villains!

1553322222222.content: How about Fairy Tail? Seems like it could have potential.
1553322222222.title: Fairy Tail?

15533222222221.content: Which girl to start with?
15533222222221.title: Where to Start?

1553322222222112.content:
The raucous sounds of the Fairy Tail guild assaulted your ears as you stealthily walked inside the double doors. You wouldn't be noticed, as you were small enough to pass for near microscopic.

A loud booming noise assaulted your senses, and your heart leapt into your throat as a red flat stepped into your field of vision. Glancing upwards to the heavens, you spotted slender feminine legs that reached into your sky, taking strides longer than you could comprehend as they made their way along their errand. Your miniscule form could just make out a frilly red skirt up in the sky, and you knew that the titaness was in fact Mirajane, the bartender and former S-rank mage of Fairy Tail.

You had no quarrel with Mirajane, however, and let her pass. Reaching into your pocket, you pulled out a flat disk and pressed a button on the top of it. A silver metallic suit surrounded you, protecting you from the various dangers that would no doubt happen at this site.

You had another agenda, and as you started up the rocket boosters in your legs, you caught a glimpse of red hair as you flew up to the height of the bar tables that were the size of mountains.

You changed course to the shock of red hair, landing on the bar table and retracting your suit. The first thing you saw was a massive teenage girl by the name of Lucy Heartfilia, who was talking animatedly to the person opposite her.

Turning around, you grinned deviously. The enormous red-haired colossus opposite Lucy was Erza Scarlet, the most powerful female mage in Fairy Tail.

You had originally come here as a "science vacation" of sorts, planning to shrink down and explore the body of the various inhabitants of this world. The fact that Erza and the other females of this guild were ungodly beautiful was just a bonus.

Still, things backfired. You appeared right smack dab in the middle of the guild, unshrunk. The guild members were sent into a frenzy, and who else would take you down than the stern and impulsive Erza.

She had you arrested under suspicious grounds. It had been a setback, but now you were technically a wanted criminal in the Fairy Tail world after you escaped (with shrinking of course).

Now, you could get back to your original task, and who better to go with than Erza Scarlet.

"Maybe a little revenge, too." you snickered evilly, thinking of what you could do. Kicking organs, zapping neurons in the brain, taking control of her body. You may be small, and Erza may be strong, but if you had her brain, even she was helpless.

"Now then... where to enter..."

Erza was talking with Lucy, a small smile on her face. She wasn't dressed in her usual armor, rather simply just her plain white blouse. A slice of cake was sitting on the table before her.

Do you...
1553322222222112.title: Erza

15533222222221121.content:
Your mind set on revenge, you casually flew up to the slice of strawberry cake, wanting to hurry because you noticed Erza scarfing down the confection ravenously.

Lucy was looking at her in amazement, just as you snuck into the moist interior of the cake, suit on for safety. The titantic fork then scooped up the bite of cake you were lodged in, raising up to the face of the hungry Erza.

You felt a sense of vertigo as you were lifted up to the enormous face of Erza Scarlet. Her grey eyes didn't notice you in the least, not realizing that she was going to allow what amounted to a parasite into her body.

Massive, fleshy red lips were directly across from him, and you looked on in awe as they parted. opening wide enough to gobble up one million people your size in one gulp.

The enormous cave drew closer, and you were drawn into its moist interior as the fork slid in and out of Erza's mouth before it closed completely. You tapped a button on your wrist, creating a small light to see ahead of you.

"This must be Erza's tongue..." you say to yourself, as you jab your boot into the wet squishy pink floor that you were standing on. White spires that could crush you into pulp rose like mountains in the distance, on all sides. You were truly miniscule. Cave couldn't even describe it. This world was like a whole other world to you.

"Ooh, nice pearly whites, Miss Scarlet!" you grin deviously. As you lounged about on Erza's tongue, your eyes wandered to the back of the mouth, where a massive dangling appendage hung over a black hole going downward.
15533222222221121.title: Sneaky Mouth Adventure

155332222222211211.content:
Erza's body didn't seem to give you a choice as to what was going to happen.

The pink tongue underneath was beginning to undulate, putting food on a direct one-way ticket to Erza's stomach. Since you happened to be a part of that food, you were being thrown along with it.

The back of Erza's mouth rushed ever closer, her uvula hanging high above you as the abyss that was her esophagus loomed below. With an excited scream, you fell through the tunnel of meat as Erza swallowed you whole.

Outside, Erza made a face.

"Is something wrong, Erza?" Lucy asked the normally armor clad girl.

Erza ran her tongue along the inside of her mouth after swallowing, swearing there was a strange taste within that last bite.

"It's nothing, Lucy. I just tasted something a little odd in my cake." the calm girl replied.

Inside the young woman's body, your freefall came to a halt as you landed in a bouncy and squishy chamber covered in a slick acid. You grinned as you took a look around the massive stomach.
155332222222211211.title: Erza swallows you

1553322222222112112.content:
You watch lit up once more, and you were able to create some slight illumination within the stomach of the girl. The walls in the distance and the floors were a deep red. The chamber of meat pulsated around you, and the floor was wet with a slippery acid.

Not that you had to worry about acid; you wouldn't be digested. In fact, Erza's body was your oyster now, and there was only one thing to do. Take your revenge.

"Suspicious, my ass. I didn't even do anything, and you still had me arrested! Well, now that I'm out, let's see how you handle a little home cooking!" you chuckled deviously, reaching into your pocket and pulling out a laser beam.

You pointed it at the floor directly in front of you, and didn't hesitate to pull the trigger. A yellow beam of light emerged from the tip of the laser, burning a spot in the stomach wall.

Your world began to rumble as Erza's stomach undulated and gurgled from the abuse it was taking. Like a slide, you rode the wave of undulation to the very far wall, pointing your laser in random directions and frying the stomach from all corners. You laughed as you had the time of your life.

Outside, Erza fought back a yelp as she felt a sharp burning pain in her stomach. Lucy looked at her with confusion, taking another bit of her own meal, while Erza rubbed her belly through the white fabric of her blouse.

"Erza-san, are you alright?"

"Y-Yeah, just give me a-AUGH!"

The same pain happened again as the girl jerked forward. Every few seconds, a jolt of pain would erupt from inside her, causing her intense spasms as she moved about with an exaggerated expression on her face.

Back in the stomach, you had reached the very edge of the stomach, and your grin reached its evilest. Pulling back, you fired the beam at the wall, but held the trigger this time.

Five seconds later, and you burned a hole in the stomach wall with your weapon, big enough for you to slide your way through. The only question now, had you had enough of this place?
1553322222222112112.title: Vengeance

choices: Take a trip to the heart.
15533222222221121121.content:
You decided you had had enough of tormenting Miss Scarlet through her stomach, and now was the time to move onto other places. The redhead titaness may have been powerful, but her internal organs were not.

Placing your gun back in its holster, you eyed the screaming red hole in the fleshy wall that was just begging you to climb on through.

With a little bit of effort, you squeezed your way on through the tear in the stomach wall, feeling the acid-slick meat transform into more basic muscle tissue, with underneath that: bone.

It was quite a sight to behold, with hard fibrous muscle surrounding you on all sides except where there was a cavity. A few pumping internal organs were set up before you, with the ripped stomach behind you in its wake.

"Hmm. Liver. Zap!" you said, firing your beam to fry the girl's large red-brown organ before you. "Gall bladder..." you zapped the organ right next to it, putting a hole in that organ as well.

You heard the giant girl outside scream in pain even from your spot in the interior.

"All these small time organs are so boring. The liver and gall bladder should cover that arrest debt, Erza, but you can't understate the amount of turmoil you've put me through ever since I got here. Oh, look! The spinal cord!"

The biology lesson continued as you continued through the S-class wizard's body to see the bony column surrounded by muscle tissue, and above that, you heard a distinct beating, no doubt accelerated by the damage you were causing. You could make a trip up there using the spinal column. It was a good appetizer, the second most important organ directly before the most important one itself.
15533222222221121121.title: Leaving a Path of Destruction

choices: Take an artery to the brain.
155332222222211211211.content:
"Agghhhhhhhh!"

Erza collapsed onto the floor of the Fairy Tail guild, which came as a shock to nearly everyone else. Her face was screwed up in pain, her strawberry cake left forgotten. She was writhing on the ground, clutching her stomach, twitching ever so often with a new sense of pain.

"Erza!" Lucy cried, rushing to help her downed friend. Several onlookers, including Mirajane, Natsu and Happy, and Wendy seemed to gather around.

"W-What is it? What's wrong with Erza-san?" Wendy asked.

"Oi!" Natsu shouted, looking very perturbed that one he considered so strong was in this condition.

"Wendy! You have healing magic! Can you tell us what's wrong with Erza!" Natsu continued to speak, shaking Wendy. Wendy spluttered and whined under the pressure, gaining wingding eyes as Natsu shook her.

"W-Well, w-we n-need to get h-her to a bed first!" she said dizzily.

Back inside, you were beginning to climb the spinal cord, having decided to take a trip to the heart, which you could hear rapidly beating rhythmically above you.

"Lalalalala!" you sung whimsically, climbing up another column of the ribcage. Here was the spot. You pushed yourself through the protective muscle and bone, entering what was the lifeforce of Erza's body. Your microscopic self had entered a throbbing red room with four different chambers, with tubes both thin and thick surrounding you like pipes to the outside.

You...
155332222222211211211.title: Beat Still Your Heart

choices: Try something else, like taking control.
1553322222222112112111.content:
"No more small time stuff! Attacking the heart may be nice, but I'm looking for central control, baby!"

The room bounced with every heartbeat; arteries, veins, and capillaries bringing precious blood to every single part of Erza's body. And with your suit on, taking a ride with one of those wouldn't be very difficult.

You turned your laser down slightly, making it just strong enough to make an incision in the closest red tube to you, one that your microscopic self could sneak into without any problems.

Turning up the rocket boosters on your suit, you flew into the slightly leaking artery with a splash, displacing the red blood around you. The biological highway shot you forward with the current like it was the world's fastest water slide, the slight transparency allowing you to see the various destinations on the interior of Erza's body.

It brought you out of the heart, passing muscles and bones as you see the enflamed organs in the distance that you have done some damage to. Nevertheless, after about thirty seconds of the bumpy ride, your descent ceased, and you were shot upward past the heard, up Erza's neck and into her cranium.

"Okay, here!"

You only had a few seconds to pull it off, but you did. You shot another small incision into the artery, coming out into a very large domed structure. The enormous, lumpy brain was being contained with the chamber of her skull, and you could see two massive eyes connected to it at the end of stalks. You had arrived at the brain.

Grinning, you walked up to the pulsating mass of grey matter.

"Left or right hemisphere? Which should I attack first? Eh, might as well hit both, make sure no one's left out!"
1553322222222112112111.title: Artery Highway

1553322222222222221222.title: Blake Belladonna

15533222222222222212221.content:
Lionel Augustine was one of those people, who, like Jaune Arc, made you wonder why they were even at Beacon in the first place. That wasn't to say he was anything like Jaune. Unlike Jaune, who was clumsy, awkward yet overall friendly, Lionel was neurotic, eccentric, paranoid, and mean.

Short, bag-eyed with jet black hair, some people wondered why he was still at Beacon. He didn't have a team. Not anymore, at least. He was so strange that they proclaimed they couldn't stand him after two weeks of living together, and for some reason, Lionel was allowed to live on his own after the fact and still attend Beacon.

He also didn't train, or participate in combat. At all. Coupled with the fact of his apparent disdain for the Faunus, cold attitude, and his ability to avoid classes without any ramifications, it was safe to say that nearly everyone at Beacon disliked the young man.

As he opened the doors to the cafeteria, Lionel could honestly say he couldn't care less about any of that. His tired red eyes scanned the room until he saw them. Team RWBY and Team JNPR sitting at their usual table, chatting the day away. When he looked at Blake though, everything seemed to change.

He saw them... the floating black and white wisps surrounding the cat faunus, and the sound of static buzzing around his mind. Scowling, he sauntered into the cafeteria, passing a few tables and glowering at anyone who would dare look in his direction.

Blake Belladonna was essentially his mortal enemy the moment she stepped foot into Beacon, and the feeling was mutual. It made sense, a former member of the White Fang and his family's relationship to the Faunus.

When he got close to the table, all eyes locked on him, most of them filled with disdain. As he didn't get along with Blake, naturally he was the enemy of both teams. He didn't care about them though at this moment. The thing he had feared, Blake had the disease.

The Grimm... inside her, that only he could see.

The scowl on his face, Lionel sat down and pounded the table to get Blake's attention, as her nose was currently lost within a thick book. A few plates and cups shattered as the entire cafeteria suddenly became aware of the tension when Blake looked at Lionel with barely restrained hatred. Since his grandfather had always been the one to propose the Faunus be confined to Menagerie, and Lionel had always been one to support that idea... at least until....

"Hey! What's the big idea?" someone shouted. It seemed to be Weiss. The other seven members of the team got to their feet, glaring daggers at Lionel for his nerve. Yang and Pyrrha even seemed to be on guard.

"What do you want?" Blake spat.

"Why..." Lionel hissed, "don't you stupid Faunus ever understand? It's always the same with you people. Menagerie, the White Fang, it doesn't matter. You want equal rights, but you don't listen. You never listen, and now it's too late. You have it..."

The palpable anger arround the table turned to confused murmuring. While Blake still glared at Lionel, she didn't actually have any idea of what he was talking about. He wasn't like normal Faunus haters. His reasonings always seemed a bit nonsensical.

"You'll see tomorrow..."

Without another word, Lionel left the table without another word, before a fight could break out.
15533222222222222212221.title: The Faunus Virus

choices: You crawl up onto the table...
1553322222222222222222211222121.content:
The pink haired Tamaranian alien-giantess was today grooming her large pink silkworm called Silkie as you watched her from the blue carpet of the Teen Titan's Tower. Starfire's skin was (as always) orange-hued and her green eyes shone like emerald stars as she looked sparkly-eyed. "Oh what joy, Silkie~" she exclaims, "Could it be another Tamaranian Feast Day this year? We must eat and collect the items of the Feast!" she rockets off quickly as you are blown away by her super-sonic speed, having to hold onto a strand of carpet. You resolve to somehow get to the table

Soon she arrives with an assortment of items, and dumps them on the kitchen table "Everyone! I have an announcement to make!" Starfire announces with a giddy twirl of joy, "Today is Tamaranian Feast Day, a glorious day to celebrate!"...
1553322222222222222222211222121.title: Let's all go exploring...

15533222222222222222222112221211.content:
Silkie crawls past Starfire, its many crab-like pink claws scuttling across the surface of the carpet while its glossy green eyes survey the domain of the carpet which it roamed. Its smiling face has a quirky expression as its two tiny antennae twitch happily as it spots a potential meal. You wave at the giant pink silkworm as the Silkie pauses and senses intelligent life in the carpet.

"Good boy, just stay there," you command it as it hops in one place happily before its tongue slurps against you to taste you. "Now can I climb on?" you ask the Silkie as it pauses and a cartoon lightbulb appears on its head as Silkie nods happily, wriggling its many legs. "Alright then." Climbing a huge pink bug takes some effort, but finally you manage it and Silkie gallops to Starfire as it squeaks and pants happily. Starfire tries to pet the Silkie, but not before she noted that it was time for its "grooming-time", which for Tamaranians consisted of licking like a cat would do.
15533222222222222222222112221211.title: Silkie gives you a lift to Starfire

15533222222222222222222112221212.content: Continue the last story or start a new one?
15533222222222222222222112221212.title: Continue this or change?

155332222222222222222221122212122.content:
(Note:This one takes place during the other story in a different interactive story You can take a look at it if you want)

After the spaceship have crash somewhere on the planet they end up on

Bobby Henry Matt and Charles all woke up a few minutes from the spaceship crash and soon they all regain their senses

"You see Bobby I told you Charles shouldn't drive" yelled Matt "Hey come on now Matt he was just trying to get the hang of it until you distracted him" yelled Henry "Oh quit defending the idiot and to think you called yourself the smart guy of the group" Matt yelled back "But instead all you do is nag nag nag all the time" "I was just bring out some criticism you really should think back of what happened" replied Henry "All I could see is that Charles ended up going straight for that damn meteorite on our way to a new planet" said Matt "He got distracted by you yelling at him to turn right or left" said Henry "WILL YOU TWO BE QUIET!!" yelled Bobby the captain of the crew "All you guys do is just yell at each others ears for the slightest of things" Both Henry and Matt frown at each other and then looked at Bobby "So we are we?" asked Henry Bobby looked at the scanners and said "Well to be honest I don't really know since the landscape don't look all that familiar" "Well should we go outside to check" asked Charles "No not yet first we must look around" said Bobby as he takes out his periscope to look around

The surrounding area was covered nothing but stones and far away was a large ocean stretching as far as eye he could see but as Bobby was about to put away his periscope he saw something gigantic compared to his tiny spaceship and soon started pointing towards the colossal object

It looks like a tower but it was in a shape of a letter T whatever it was it must be an important tower "What kind of tower is that sir?" asked Charles "I don't really know but ether way it could serve as a good home for us come on guy let's go" said Bobby "What?! We going to live on that ridiculous looking tower?" yelled Matt "I miss Tamarana" said Charles "I know you do Charles" said Henry "But then again it would be a great place to live if it weren't for those other aliens that invaded the planet" "I'll love to live inside one of those Tamaranians their insides we're real cozy" said Matt "Well it's the only thing that is close by" said Bobby "We're Extersites we can pretty much survive in almost in many climates"

Extersites are a race of tiny nearly microscopic people that looked like human being but they have a few insect-like appendages they used to live in a far off planet but it was destroyed by a destructive doomsday so they try to find another planet to live on until they founded Tamarana we're they live ether inside the aliens we're they were like parasites to them or lived hiding underground They later were invaded by another alien race and nearly destroyed the planet but is enough to cause a few of Extersite to relocate to yet another planet "I say let's travel there by foot and leave the ship behind" said Bobby "But sir we have no idea what's in that tower the people living there will probably pose a treat" said Henry "I say let's just ride our ship there safety" Bobby started to have some second thoughts
155332222222222222222221122212122.title: In a new planet

choices: They go staright towards a open window on the tower
Suddenly something happens while on their way to the tower
1553322222222222222222211222121221.content:
As Bobby thinks about Henry's plain he then shook his head and says "Too risky I'll doubt it's going to help us in our new home so I'm afraid will just have to leave our ship and go on foot" "I'm going to miss the ship" said Charlie as he walk towards it and rub his hand on it "You'll behave good okay don't worry we'll be alright" He said as he now puts his arm around it as Matt facepalms himself and muttered "God damnit" under his breath

As the four tiny aliens now begin their reckless journey to shelter They started to fly above the ground and straight towards the T tower
1553322222222222222222211222121221.title: Bobby's way

15533222222222222222222112221212211.content:
A few seconds later The Extersites have finally reached the tower and begin finding a entrance to the tower "Well it's time find a entrance around here" says Bobby As he and the others are looking for one Henry than gets an idea "How about we go find an open window to get inside quicker and we'll find shelter in no time" "But we just flew all the way here" Yelled Matt "And your point is?" asked Herny "MY point is that we immediately flew here for nothing because of you!" Yelled Matt "WILL YOU TWO BE QUIET" Yelled Bobby "THIS IS THE SECOND TIME I ASKED YOU THIS" The two stopped arguing and looked at their captain They both hope they don't trigger his bad side because if they did they'll end up being forced to hear him scream for like 25 or 30 second about how they always fighting for many reasons and they never get along with each other "So let's take your idea Henry since I liked your idea about going for a quick shortcut rather than going immediately inside this tower to climb it" Matt was about to go against this plan but upon seeing Bobby's staring at him with a scowl he decided drop it "Well what are we waiting for let's go" Said Charlie rather impatiently

As they flew up the tower they could see a huge window at the top it look like it could lead to a larger room making it large enough for some shelter but at the bottom of the large window they could see some smaller ones but what caught their eyes is that one of the windows is slightly opened It made not look like it could contain a bigger room but it look much easier to enter it "So we do you think we should go?" asked Charlie
15533222222222222222222112221212211.title: Entering the tower

155332222222222222222221122212122112.content:
"Hmm...I think we should head to the smaller window" said Bobby "The large window a little too risky" "Well let's go then" yelled Charlie "Seriously Charlie do you have to be this freakin loud" yelled Matt "Forget it Matt let's just keep going" said Henry Matt scowled at Henry he hope that if they find shelter he doesn't share the same room with him because he'll probably end up annoying him with ridiculous lecture

The tiny aliens flew down towards the small window below and land on the edge of the window They peer through the opened window to see that it leads to...
155332222222222222222221122212122112.title: The small window

choices: ...saw pretty much nothing (yet they could sworn they hear somewhere far ahead)
1553322222222222222222211222121221121.content:
The 4 tiny aliens flew right through the open window As they landed down to the ground they soon quickly found themselves in a giant forest with long thin blue trees in every corner "Why is there a forest around this place" said Charlie as he looked around confused "Relax Charlie we're on a giant blue carpeted floor" said Bobby "So is this our new home for now on" said Henry "Not quite we just might have to find a safer spot to inhabit in Just to be safe from the giants that roam around here" said Bobby "Hmm perhaps beneath that enormous bookshelf over there" said Matt as he pointed to the giant bookshelf several feet ahead of them "Great choice Matt we could be probably safe from the giants in there" said Bobby as Matt gave Henry a tauntingly look which makes Henry rolls his eyes in annoyance

In about several minutes The Extersites have reach the below part of the bookshelf and while under the shelf Bobby commands the three to search around the giant bedroom in order to know the place correctly The other 3 flew to the peak of beneath the bookshelf and searched around They saw a large purple round bed in the middle and at the right were two giant doors The rest were just simple furnitures Looking more closely they...
1553322222222222222222211222121221121.title: ...a bedroom

choices: Go check out the giant being
15533222222222222222222112221212211211.content:
As the 3 decided that everything seems fine Charlie all of the sudden spotted something across the room and soon said "Say guys I think I saw something huge over there" he said as he pointed towards the giant bed Looking at the giant object it turns out it's not really a object but more of a living being "Who do you think it is?" said Henry "How should we know this is our first time around here" said Matt "I wonder we should report Bobby that there's a giant being around this room" said Charlie "Oh c'mon I think we should take a risk and find out who this giant really is After all we're real good at survival" said Matt "Please I don't remember any thing about survival all I can remember was you being a total jackass" said Henry "Whatever you say smartass I still think we should check it out ourselves" said Matt

They all looked at the gigantic being and then under the bookshelf were their captain was They soon stood there trying to think of a next plan
15533222222222222222222112221212211211.title: ...suddenly saw someone across the room

choices: Their captain Bobby called them from their radio translator
The giantess drops into her bed and falls asleep
155332222222222222222221122212122112112.content:
Henry looked at Matt with a glare and said "Alright fine you win, let's take a look at whatever that giant being is" Upon hearing this, Matt throws his fist up in victory and said "At last I finally made up a plan way better than that freaking smartass" Henry smacks Matt behind his head, apparently very displeased about his comment on Henry being a smartass "Well can we go look at that giant person sitting on the bed now?" asked Charlie "Yeah can we?" asked Matt giving Henry a tauntingly smile "Yes yes YES" yelled Henry "but try not to get close to that creature since we don't know if it's safe or dangerous" Three tiny aliens then flew straight towards the giant

It took about two minutes to reach their destination but they stopped just about a few miles (from their sizes) away from the giant The Extersites then take a closer look at the giant sitting on top of the bed The most interesting thing of all, is that the giant is actually a young female, possibly a teenager She has long red hair that went half way down her back They couldn't see much of her features because they are only looking at her back, which speaking of has a oddly orange coloring across her backside The weird thing is that, looking at both of her hair and skin kinda looks very familiar to them "Do any of you guys noticed that she kinda looks familiar?" asked charlie as Henry answered "You know what Charlie, I think you got a point She does look very familiar kinda like something from..." suddenly Henry was soon interrupted when...
155332222222222222222221122212122112112.title: Go check out the giant being

choices: Suddenly Bobby arrives to tell about the giantess's familiar species
The giantess begins to move around in her sleep
1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.content:
..............................................

What seen to took about 10 minutes for Starfire to write on her diary about her everyday life, raging from having fun with her friends in many places to fighting against evil, Starfire finally finish writing about the long day she have both yesterday and today She lets out a loud yawn as she puts her dairy away and says "My, that sure took much longer than what I expected to be I'm quite tried too I sure wonder if I could take a small peaceful nap for today" The young alien girl stretched her arms out and climbs and drops into her bed She closed her eyes and soon after a while, she drifts into a deep sleep as she let's out a small smile Little did Starfire know that she's being watched...

..............................................

The Extersites watched as the giant girl climbed her bed and, for a few moment, fell completely asleep

"Hey Henry I wonder if we finally look at the rest of her appearance now that she's asleep?" asked Charle "Well let's take a quick look at her and then we can tell Bobby about this" said Henry as he and other two now begin to descend to the very bottom of the bed and see the sleeping giantess right in front of them who's now completely colossal to them as they're about the size of mites compare to her

By this view, they could finally tell that her skin was completely orange in color but that's not only strange appearance this giantess has, she was also wearing a odd sci-fi-like outfit as she's wearing a purple sleeveless, midriff-baring top with a large metal neck piece on top, a pair of long fingerless gloves, a purple skirt tied up by a belt, and a pair of thigh-high purple boots The tiny aliens also noticed one last usual thing: she seems to lack a navel on her bare stomach "Henry do you think what I think she is?" asked Matt as he finally realized what kind of creature this young giantess is
1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.title: Nap time

1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.content:
"I see you guys already found our new home"

The three aliens heard a voice behind them as they now see their captain Bobby standing behind them "Bobby how did you get here?" asked Henry "And wait, what do you mean by "new home"? " asked Matt Bobby looked at his crew and answers "Let me explain everything, while you guys are off exploring this gigantic room, I immediately made an amazing discovery It all started when I decided to use my scanners to scan this entire tower and there I saw that this place have about five giants but one of them surprised me the most, to see how where now on a much different planet I found that this giant is none other than a certain alien that we usually call them "home" but that alien is actually called a Tamaranean!"

The aliens have knew this was coming "So let me get this straight, where on a different planet and yet right in front of us is a Tamaranean from the planet Tamaran?" asked Matt "Awesome! I never knew there were Tamaraneans on this planet too!" said Charlie "I wonder if this one have some other Extersites living inside her body as well?" asked Henry "So does this mean we could live inside that sleeping Tamaranean?" asked Charlie "Now now settle down men, now that we found the perfect home for us to stay, now is the time for some action" said Bobby "HOORAY WE GOING TO LIVE INSIDE A TAMARANEAN!!!" yelled Charlie at the top of his lungs yet not even loud enough to wake the gargantuan alien girl who's still sleeping "Goddamnt Charlie do you have to be so freaking loud" yelled Matt as he's now covering his ears

The extersites begin to fly off the ground and fly right towards the face of the sleeping Tamaranean which looked huge enough to cover the New York city They thought of entering the mouth but they scratched that since they're too small to lift her closed mouth So they now have two options: the ear or the nose
1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.title: The perfect home found

1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.content:
"I say we go inside her body through the ear, since the mucuses in her nose will just slow us down and she could just sneeze us out at any movement, so the ear seem to be the less dangerous route to her body though we should be quiet and try to avoid the earwaxs around her ear" said Bobby as the three crew agree with the plan of his "I guess that's a good choice" said Henry "Can we go inside her PLEASE!!" yelled Charlie "We're on our way you crybaby so SHUT UP" scolded Matt. Bobby faceplams himself as he begin thinking to himself "These guys never learn at all". The four micro aliens flied upwards and soon begin to fly towards the unaware alien girl's ear.

The Extersites soon made their way towards the ear as they're now floating right above it. Looking down, the enormous ear looked more like a huge dried-up lake or a large sinkhole that was about a hundred miles below. Charlie looked down in sheer excitement and said "I can't wait to go back inside an Tamaranean and feel the cozy warm insides" "I sure wish I don't have to share a bed with you and Henry as we get inside" grumbled Matt. Henry looked at Matt with a "Screw you" type of expression "Aright guys, this is the movement we finally be home once again, Are you ready guys?" Bobby asked his crew as they all replied "Ready". The Extersites soon flew downwards at max speed and straight towards the giant Tamaranean girl's ear.

..............................................

Starfire stood there sleeping and unaware of the tiny parasites now adventuring through her earlobe.
1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.title: The beginning of the almost-forgotten endo story

choices: The aliens made a interesting discovery: there was a tiny town below the eardrum
There was nothing out of the ordinary as they reach the eardrum
1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.content:
The four microscope aliens flew through the enormous orange tunnel of the Tamaranean's ear while trying to avoid large piles of yellow gunk that are the earwax which they could be completely stuck if they come in contract with them "This is so exciting" said Charlie "I can't wait to see more parts of her insides" "Speaking of which, sir where do you think we should seek shelter in?" asked Henry "Good question, We'll eventually go inside the brain so we could see some more info of this host by grabbing into some parts of the nervous system in which the information will be stored inside our own brains to remeber everything about this body" Bobby answered as three agreed that it sounds interesting "However, we don't even know yet but this Tamaranean might hold some other species of our kind since this one have somehow survived the destruction of her home planet she could have still unknowingly have if not hundreds of them continuing to live on inside her body as if nothing happened" The three looked at Bobby with a look of interest and surprise "So what you're saying there probably a bunch of creatures like us still living inside this girl's body and they still continue to do so?" asked Matt "Like I said we still don't know" said Bobby "Now let's continue our way to the brain shall we?" The three followed their captain as they fly to their destination

As the micro aliens continued their way through the ear, they soon see a large wall at the far distance The wall looked soft and bouncy and it seem to continuously vibrate to the sounds around it The Extersites knew what it was, it was the large spongy wall of the alien's eardrum "Looks like we're almost here boys we just have to slip through the gaps of the eardrum if we want to go to the brain" said Bobby as he and the others flew torwards the enormous wall of the eardrum
1553322222222222222222211222121221121122.title: Journey through an alien's ear

Rather than her obnoxiously loud snoring, you hear Jackie give out heavy breathing. Mucus comes rushing behind you, and sprays out of her nose. In case if it wasn't obvious, she sneezed. The sneeze woke her up, and the droplets of mucus that came from it spread out with no where to go. You were stuck in a droplet, and that one landed on her right arm, getting caught on a hair.

***

After a nice nap, Jackie wakes up with a sneeze. She rubs her nose with her hand and sniffles to get rid of any escaping mucus. After that, she notices something on her arm. It's the size of a gnat, has no wings, and looks like a person. She looks at her arm to see the tiny thing. It's a tiny human being! What's it doing there? More importantly, why is it tiny in the first place?

***

Suddenly, Jackie spots you. Does this mean you're busted? Your heart pounds very fast as the fear of being spotted fills you.

"Excuse me, tiny person, what are you doing on my arm?" Jackie asks you. It seems like she's curious, not upset.

The fear of being busted leaves you as the fear of telling the truth comes in like a kind of energy being transformed into another kind of energy.

Do you want to be honest or lie?

1553322222222222222222211222222212211112.content:
Even though lies are the glue that hold society together, they would make you feel very shady. Overall, you decided to tell the truth.

"You see, I was exploring the inside of your body," you answer. Jackie's face becomes filled with shock. Looks like you're in trouble now.

"So, what was it like?" she asked, giving a big smile on her face.

Well, that was unexpected; she likes the fact that you were inside her. Then again, all you were doing was exploring.

With all the fears gone away, you answer, "It was pretty cool, but it was rather short. All I did was go in your mouth, enter your lungs, and exit through your nose."

"WOWIE!" she responded, "I can't believe you were able to do that at your size! Now I wanna go inside someone." It looks like Jackie is on her way to becoming an endosomatophiliac. "By the way, how did you get that small?" she asked.

"I honestly don't know," you answered, "The only thing I know is that I woke up like this."

"Cool!" she responds, "So, you wanna keep exploring me?"

"Sure! That's what I intended at the beginning."

"Okay, so where do you wanna explore?"

In the middle of the night, there was an old warehouse that looked like it was abandoned for years. However inside the building, there was a large submarine-like structure that looked like it was recently built. What was this thing doing inside the warehouse?

--------------

"Complete!" you said as you admired your latest invention "With my newly created mini-submarine, I can use this to explore the vast microscopic world of the human body." You always liked the idea of trying to explore the body probably due to the thought of looking around inside from your prescriptive is kind of fascinating to you. "Now let's see if this thing works" you said as you climbed on top of the submarine and entered it.

You looked around the inside; seeing several controls and monitors everywhere. You sat down next to the main controls and pressed a big red button that said 'SHRINK'. Sparks of green lights began to surround the entire submarine and slowly starts to diminish in size along with you from the inside. Soon, you and the sub have now reached to only a centimeter tall. You smiled and pressed another button to reveal a computer screen. The screen shows a map of the whole neighborhood and start to search for a host to explore.

Suddenly, you spotted a home that looked normal. This house belonged to the family of superheroes known as the Incredibles. "I bet traveling inside one of their bodies would make an amazing trip." you said with an excitable tone.

Ginormica was already so large that despite her anus being shut, you could still pass through it easily in your mini-sub. The inside was like a massive heated cave, and it was so wide and dark that you couldn't even see the edges of it with the high beams of your sub. Still, you continued onwards, and the light coming from Ginormica's butt hole faded away to a tiny, faint pinprick. Eventually you came to a sheer wall with wide ridges -- a place where Ginormica's large intestine curled in and upwards. You landed on a ridge and put on your suit, exiting the sub so you could see for yourself the sheer enormity of the giantess's body. Each ridge, by your estimation, had to be at least fifty feet apart.

Suddenly, you heard a rumbling sound from high above you, and the ridge seemed to slant downwards. Your sub started to slide out into the abyss. As you ran to get back in, there was another rumble. You flicked your high beams upwards, and saw a mammoth dark shape the size of a mountain slowly descending. It was a massive turd, and it was about to engulf your submarine! You ran as fast as you could to the hatch, but can you make it?

1. Yes -- just in time to be compacted in the turd, with only your periscope free. You will be stuck there at least until Ginormica's next bowel movement, to which you will have a front-row seat. Just hope she notices before she pulls the handle...

1553322222222222222222222111.content:
Zelda sat in her courtyard, admiring the clear summer's day.

It had been several months since the Hero of Time had defeated the Evil King Ganondorf. Repairs to their world were coming along nicely, and the months afterwards gave people time to mourn for those who lost their lives during the brutal reign. She recalled having had to send Link back seven years to regain the time he had lost, but it was with a heavy heart that she did such a thing.

Ganon's Castle had been torn down completely, and the newly restored Hyrule Castle was where the Princess of Hyrule found herself living once it had been completed.

She watched a ladybug fly away from the daisy at her feet, wondering how things had gotten to be so lonely. Everyone else in the entire kingdom was busy, and she had always been shut in the castle before Ganondorf's reign, with very few friends. Looks like she was back to that now. Not to mention, she had come of age and was next in line to rule. Her coronation was in three months.

She would just have to keep up the austere, dignified disposition as royalty and the bearer of the Triforce of Wisdom.

Her blue eyes panned down to the daisy at her feet, where she saw another bug doing a task of some kind upon the petal, maybe a quarter of an inch tall.

Her pupils dilated and her mouth dropped open at what she was seeing.

"What are you?"

Carefully, Zelda took off the opera gloves from both hands, revealing her dainty, slender hands. She reached forward to the flower, barely pinching the creature up with her well-manicured nails.

She deposited the being on the soft palm of her hand, and she noticed it was marveling at the ridges of her hand and her fingers in the background. They must have been enormous.

She held it... no him up to her face, and realized what she was looking at was a tiny man. It was very clear, he had the same exact features as a human being, save for the rounded ears that told her he clearly wasn't a Hylian. He definitely wasn't a Minish either, because he exactly resembled the round-eared humans that came from lands other than Hyrule. He looked several years older than her, but was still very clearly young.

He regarded her with a clear look of intelligence, and had clearly not been bothered by her picking him up. In fact, the display seemed to make him smile.

Her sensitive ears pricked up as he spoke.

"Pleased to meet you, your highness..." the man said, before bowing.
1553322222222222222222222111.title: Hyrule's Princess

15533222222222222222222221111.content:
Awkward silence.

Zelda sat there in the garden, her mouth hanging open as she tried to form words. The young princess was typically a very wise ruler, but she had never expected something like this.

"W-Who are you?" she asked, not wanting to seem rude. She was lucky there was no one else around to see her in this moment of (what the kingdom would consider) weakness.

The young man smiled.

"My name is Patrick, your Majesty. Think of my as a dimensional traveler of sorts, but I am also a biologist. I have come to Hyrule in order to complete some of my latest works. One of them is about... well, never mind. Your courtyard just happened to be my landing spot when I arrived. Of course, you exploits are known even to me, so I felt I just had to meet you in person."

Dimensions? Biology? Zelda's mind wrapped around the concept; they had sent Ganondorf to another dimensions, so the concept wasn't so far-fetched. It also wasn't the first time someone snuck into the castle to meet, but this man was certainly... the most unique individual.

"But, why are you so tiny?"

"Ah, that would be a side effect, I'm afraid. I am a size-shifter by nature, by after dimensional traveling, it appears that my current size is most natural in this realm. But enough about me, let's talk about you, your Majesty."

Zelda looked perplexed, but she tried to remain calm.

"With your face so large to me, it's fairly easy for me to read facial expressions. I can tell from this angle that something is bothering you, but you are putting on a brave face."

"I don't know what you're talking about, sir! I understand you are a guest in this kingdom, but it would not do you any good to accuse royalty of such a thing!"

Farore, her lie was awful. He probably saw right through her.

Annnd, he was gone.

The man had disappeared from the palm of her hand in a lightning flash while she was thinking, but the man would reappear soon enough as she felt a tickle at the very base of her neck just above her breasts.

The tickle moved upward, clearing her chin and latching itself onto her right cheek. It moved upward and to the center, and what she felt were tiny hands and feet climbing her soft skin.

"Oh my goddesses! He's on my face! He's on my face!" her mind screamed, her heart beating faster.

She felt him climb up onto her nose, and she crossed her eyes to look at him. There the man sat, on the tip of the royal nose, looking into Zelda's massive blue eyes.

"Now, you listen here, young lady!" he began lecturing. Zelda almost fell down. Here she was, five-hundred times his size AND royalty, and he was going to stand on her nose and lecturing.

"What you went through was a horrible experience that no one should ever have to go through. You're bottling it up, and that isn't good for anyone!"

Her eyes began to waver. She had been thinking about that ever since Ganondorf's reign ended.

"It's okay to vent! To show emotion! You should, or you'll just waste away..."

Tears pricked at the corner of her eyes, looking to Patrick like twin rivers as they began to cascade down her face.

"It's all my fault! All of it! I'm the one that sent Link on that ridiculous mission! I opened up the way for Ganondorf! Me! I'm the reason Hyrule was conquered, and my father died, and I ruined Link's life and people died! I carry the Triforce of Wisdom and I was too stupid to realize that this would been coming. Now they want me to rule but don't deserve it! I can't do this alone! I-I can't. I-I'm scared to..." she blubbered, tears streaming down her face.

And there it was. All of her insecurities of the past seven plus years, that she wanted to get out but was never able to. And she told it all to the stranger.

The man on her nose rubbed its tip gently.

"There, there. Shh..." he cooed. "You made some mistakes, but you were ten years old at the time. You couldn't have known that was what happened, all that matters is that your heart is in the right place."

Zelda sniffled, getting a grip on her self.

"It's normal to be afraid, especially in your case. You're eighteen years old I believe, and now you're a few months shy of ruling an entire nation. But the people love you! They wouldn't have it any other way."

Zelda stared ahead, drying the tears from her eyes.

Patrick yelped in surprise as her hand reached out and grabbed him none too gently and whisked him away. Head spinning from the bumpy ride, he found himself pressed tightly into smooth white and pink fabric, something soft and bouncy beneath.

Zelda's hands cradled him as she hugged him to her bosom tightly, still sniffling after she poured out all her fears to him.
15533222222222222222222221111.title: Zelda's Fears

choices: Patrick tells her what his mission is.
155332222222222222222222211111.content:
Patrick blushed as Zelda held him to her bosom for a full five minutes, simply sitting there and pressing him into her chest as the rest of her tears subsided.

When it was finally over, her hands removed him far more gently than she had brought him there, and Patrick found himself standing in the palm once again.

"I apologize. I don't know what came over me..." she said, but with far more emotion that she had earlier.

"Don't apologize. I understand."

"What do you plan to do now?" Zelda asked, suddenly feeling far more at ease with her guest.

"Well, I was planning on getting back to my work. I have bug species to catalog, and then there's my extra special mission that I have to take care of..."

"Do you have to go?"

"Hmm?"

"I could use a friend here. It gets awfully lonely here, and I don't know know if I can take it much longer... Please, could you stay? I promise everything will be provided for, and you can still go about what you need to do."

Patrick laughed.

"See a tiny man, and you can't help but make him your pet, huh?"

Zelda spluttered, the normally austere princess looking flabbergasted.

"N-No, that's not... i-it's just... I w-want..."

"You're a little young for me..."

Zelda blushed.

"...but I'm not against staying. You ARE royalty, after all. I suppose I have an obligation to keep you happy. Tell you what, you help me with my assignment, and I'm yours..."

Zelda smiled, and Patrick yelped once again as she enclosed her fist around him. This time, she pressed him into her right cheek, squinting and smiling cutely.
155332222222222222222222211111.title: Zelda and Patrick

choices: Zelda is responsive to the idea (in fact, VERY responsive)
1553322222222222222222222111111.content:
It had been three days since Zelda and Patrick met out in the courtyard of the revived Hyrule Castle, and Patrick had noticed that Zelda's mood was getting significantly better.

It had worked out well, coming to this video game world. He expected to be small, but he didn't expect that he would land smack dab in the middle where the Hyrulian Princess was.

He had planned to get some info on local bugs before he moved onto his real goal: to draw an accurate map of a human's inside and out. Before, he had thought he would enter some random Hylian, but now...

He would have to talk it over with Zelda first. His size shifting powers allowed him to get smaller for an indefinite period of time, but he could also take on a human size for roughly an hour before he reverted back into his default size.

He had told Zelda of his powers the first night here; she seemed especially happy afterwards.

"Patrick?"

That was Zelda's voice. It seemed to be coming outside the room, which was Zelda's master bedroom. This was where he had spend most of his time the last few days, while Zelda performed royal duty. It was night now, so she should be getting back any moment.

"Can you get on the floor? I want to show you something!"

Sighing, Patrick stepped off the nightstand which contained his makeshift bad, and onto the floor. He heard the rumbling of the door in the distance, and a massive shadow fell over him as the pitter-patter of feet sounded.

He came face to face with said feet, very pale and painted with a lovely red polish.

"What do you think?" Zelda's calm voice said from far above him.

Patrick strained his neck, past legs that went on for miles, before his breath hitched in his throat.

"Goddess..." a little drool began leaking from the corner of his mouth.

The smiling Zelda looked down upon the tiny Patrick in lingerie. Her tight pink nightgown hugged her body perfectly, showing off her curves and flowing down to meet a small pair of panties of the same color. He swore the sound he heard was her breasts straining against the fabric, as they were ready to spill forth.

"I really want to have sex with you..." he blurted out, before he covered his mouth with his hands and paled.

Saying that to another woman would probably get him slapped. Saying it to royalty could get him beheaded. Hell, she could just dispose of him right now.

Still, maybe she sucks dick?

Instead, Zelda's smile grew wider, from calm to mischievous.

"Oh, do you now?"

Before Patrick could react, the long slender toes of her right foot shot out. Patrick fell on his butt as her big and second toes enclosed around him, squeezing and torso and ensnaring him.

The younger girl sat her bed. The roles had been reversed. Whereas he had taken the authority the other day to confront her about her past, she was now dominating him with the demeanor of a ruler.

"Breaking into my courtness, talking back to me, and now proclaiming that we wish to bed me. Normally, such acts would not go unpunished..." the girl said to the man between her toes.

She squeezed harder, knocking the air out of Patrick as his eyes bugged out. She seemed to know the line between teasing and actually hurting, and would not cross it.

Her grip loosened.

"I'm going to give you what you want, but it's not going to be immediate. I'm going to make you want it so badly, to the point where you can't stand it anymore. I'm curious, what is you big mission that you talked about? I'm curious, and telling me may help me be a little more lenient on you..." she pouted, releasing her grip.

Patrick climbed up upon the big toe, staring at the princess as he spilled exactly what his mission was. Her eyes lit up with understanding as you sat back down, preparing what to say next.

"So, um... I was going to use another person once I got here, but the situation didn't go how I expected. So... um... you I possibly use your body as the one?"

Zelda...
1553322222222222222222222111111.title: Patrick's Objective

1553322222222222222222222121.content:
"oof..." You grumble as you suddenly find yourself deep within darkness. As you instinctively move your hands about the alien location your hands and skin end up coming into contact with a rather strange solid object. For some reason it was somewhat rectangular at most yet cylindrical in other times. While it was rather stiff, the strange objects did carry a great brittleness to them, as hinted by the light sounds of cracking. "huh?" you mutter having no idea just how you ended up...wherever you were. While you were buried underneath the strange pile of giant stick like objects, you soon take notice over jest how easy it was to move many about. Curious, and not wanting to remain amidst the dark any longer, you soon begin to scurry your way past the large sticks before suddenly being greeted by a blinding light.
After a second or two of having your eyes come into focus, you soon find yourself gazing up at what looked like a wooden rooftop. The only exception from an average building interior was the fact that the whole ceiling seemed to be miles up in the air, with wood supports that seemed to rival that of a normal buildings size. "w-what the!?" you stammer absolutely dumbfounded by the odd sight before lowering your eyes to gaze about your strange surroundings. All about you was wooden pillars and even gates aligned in rows besides the walls. Just by the many farm tools and giant metal canisters aligning the farthest wall, it was easy to tell that this place looked just like some sort of storing area for animals. However, while this place did look like it would be ideal for keeping animals, there wasn't a sign of life located within the gates at all.

Curiously, you begin to clamber your way out from within the odd pile of sticks, which you soon realize was a ginormous stack of hay, to gaze about the massive interior. Just how you ended up here was a mystery on it's own, however the bigger question of the moment was just who's building did this belong to? As you pondered the possibilities, the sudden loud sounds of a creak immediately catches your attention. With wide eyes, you quickly scramble your way close to the massive hay pile before slowly peering out at the direction of the Creak.

"Boy! what a day." The sound of a young female voice says followed by what sounded like a small groan. With dumbfounded eyes, you watch as the mysterious stranger makes her way into the building. Adorned on her head were long locks of dark orange hair that flowed down her back in a rather lazy fashion. The front of her bangs were oddly parted, each section ending up with curled ends with large blue eyes located right beneath them. The strange giantess was garbed in a simple blouse with a yellow handkerchief as well as a rather long violet skirt stopping slightly above her ankles to reveal her worn leather boots. With each step this strange giant girl made, your whole surroundings, as well as you, were shaken about with each loud Boom. After moments of unbalanced tremors, you quickly gaze up to notice that the giantess was standing right before the hay pile. Without warning, she lazily turns her back towards the mound of straw before lazily lying back with arms out stretched.

The impact from her landing did cause the hay to shake violently besides you, though luckily you manage to keep a steady footing. As your eyes continue to gaze upwards you notice her massive hands lazily limped under a pile of supporting hay. "Ahhh....It feels great to take a breather after such a long day of work." you hear her voice emanate high above. After minutes of utter silence pass by, a rhythmic breathing was eventually heard from above the pile. Just by noticing her limp hand and the repeating calm breaths escaping the giantess, it was easy to assume that she must've fallen asleep. With a small sigh of relief, yet an ever-growing curiosity, you begin to gently clamber your way upwards the giant hay mound. After minutes of trial and error, mainly due to the brittle nature of the hay, you finally make it to the top where the girls massive abdomen lied before you.

Just from the vantage point you were in, you could tell that this giant girl rivaled that of any skyscraper known in existence. The only question right now though was just what to do...
1553322222222222222222222121.title: The giant farmgirl

15533222222222222222222221211.content:
As you gaze upon the ginormous red head's body, two voices inside your mind were at war with one another. One voice was beckoning you to explore this massive beings body. At your current tiny size this could be a once in a lifetime opportunity. Why bother trying to pass it up? On the other hand, the other voice was urging you to act more rational. There was no telling how dangerous it would be trying to scale this huge girl's body, let alone the consequences that should follow if she woke up. As you stand still, deciding which side to choose in this awkward predicament, it seemed that the evil side was just too good to pass up. Besides, you could always try and be careful when scaling up her body. With the decision made, a small smirk emerges on your face as you carefully walk up and grip the white fabric of her blouse.

The ascent upwards was quite easy to say the least. Thanks to the soft fabric and steady position of the ginormous farm girl, clambering upwards proved to be quite the ease. You were just thankful that there was barely any sign of movement from the sleeping giantess as you were now past the midway point of her abdomen. After a few more minutes passed by, your muscles soon began to feel the burning twinges of the seemingly simple exercise. "Almost...there." you huff as you finally manage to pull your form up and onto the slant like surface of the abdomen edge. Taking a brief moment of respite, you immediately catch your breath while kneeling down upon the soft surface.

With one final inhale, you gaze up at your current location upon the huge farm girl's body. Once there however, you could feel the floor beneath you rise up and downwards from each breath that the giantess made. You are a galactic bounty hunter, who faces serious competition in the form of Samus Aran. Contrary to your expectations, you successfully sneak into her gunship, as your rival sleeps in her Zero Suit, apparently tired from a long day of battling Space Pirates. With a press of a button, you are consumed in a brief flash before almost instantly being reduced to half an inch in size.

Climbing onto Samus's bed, you note three possible entry points: the ear, a perfect route to her brain; the nose, a slightly more gross but still viable path; and the mouth, slightly open, but not too much of a problem at your current height.

As you hear the turning of the doorknob to Samus's room, you instinctively activate the device and are rapidly reduced to half an inch in size, just in time to avoid the woman's notice as she enters her room. You take a moment to stare in awe at her features -- her rosy lips, her orange crop top and shorts, her bare belly, her exposed pits...she's an all-around gorgeous person. And it seems she's tired from today's Smash bouts as she lies down in her bed, closing her eyes in preparation for a well-earned rest.

You are a video-game geek who also has a thing for giantesses - especially the idea of exploring a giant woman from the inside. Entering the vehicle and pressing a large red button, your vessel disappears from your secret basement lab and almost instantaneously appears in a fancy-looking bedroom. Everything looks bigger than it should be, but in truth, you’re about the size of an ant. As you hear the doorknob turning, you swiftly guide your sub under the bed as the door opens, revealing the lovely Princess Daisy. Her ginger-colored hair, her sapphire eyes, her orange dress, her cute lips...everything about Daisy is just perfect! The princess approaches her bed, lets out a yawn, and lies down for a short nap.

155332222222222222222222222222222221221.content:
It was a night of joy for Naomi and Seiko. Well, mostly for Seiko since she liked to play with Naomi's boobs.

This would've been an ordinary night for the two, but everything changed when Seiko pulled out a book.

"Seiko, what is that book?" Naomi asked.

"Oh, this book is filled with spells. Ayumi gave it to me at lunch today."

"A spell book?" Naomi became filled with fear from hearing that. "Y'know, we shouldn't be messing with that."

"Oh, come on!" Seiko replied, "I'm not using it to summon a demon or anything! Besides, it's a gift, so there shouldn't be anything wrong with it."

"What are you planning to do with it then?"

"There's this spell that can make a person invincible, but they'll become the size of a gnat. It's kind of like a 'Would You Press the Button?' scenario where you have the choice to do something, but there's a tradeoff involved with it."

Hearing that spell's description made Naomi filled with more worries. Seiko must be planning it to use it on her for whatever antics she's up to.

"You're gonna use it on me, aren't you?" Naomi asked with a shaky voice.

Seiko gave her a sinister smirk as she reads from the book, "Subscribe-icus to Anime-icus America-icus."

After hearing those words, Naomi's worries changed into thoughts of exasperation.

"Was that seriously the spell chant?" Naomi asked, "That is the stupidest chant I-"

All of a sudden, Naomi blacked out and laid unconscious for 5 seconds. The moment she got up, she realized how big her clothes got. With her clothes being too big for her, this gives her the realization that she shrunk. The spell actually worked! Her worries returned right as Seiko lifted up her clothes off the bed.

"Oh, there you are!" Seiko said. As Naomi observed, Seiko was flat-out naked! Naomi's worries came back. "Now we can have some fun!" Seiko continued.

"What do you think you're gonna do to me?" Naomi worriedly asked.

"You see, Naomi, I've had fun playing with your body, so I thought it might be nice of you played with my body," Seiko answered.

"Yeah, but why change my size?!"

"So you can explore my body, DUH!"

Seiko picks up Naomi to think of where her tiny friend could explore.
155332222222222222222222222222222221221.title: One Fun Night

1553322222222222222222222222222222212211.content:

Naomi began panicking as Seiko lifted her towards her nose. A gust of wind from Seiko's nose sucked her towards the hairy cave.

choices: ...give in to Seiko and explore her body.

Seiko kept sniffing her tiny friend. There's nothing that Naomi could do other than to scream in terror.

"Oh, Naomi," Seiko aroused, "I could keep smelling you all day." She kept sniffing her friend until she let go of her.

As Naomi got sucked into Seiko's nose, more terror filled her as she's now inside her friend. The way to Seiko's lungs was scary and amusing at the same time. It was amusing because Seiko's interiors were a joy to look at. It was scary because the way she got in was like riding a rollercoaster that leads to the depths of hell.

Once Naomi finally made it to Seiko's lungs, she felt broken inside, as if Seiko has control of her every move now. She was panting like crazy after that way in.

"I hear your panting," said Seiko, "How did you like the ride to my lungs?"

"It was horrifying," Naomi weeps, "You perverted MONSTER!!"

1553322222222222222222222222222222222222.content:
Big the Cat was ready to go fishing with Froggy when suddenly, Froggy was missing.

"Froggy?" Big called out, "Where are you, Froggy?"

He searched everywhere for his friend: his house, the pool, the forest, and Dr. Eggman's lair, but no luck.

At Eggman's lair, Big noticed a room with submarines in them; one of the subs isn't there. He was curious to know what's up with them, so he goes in one of them.

Suddenly, Orbot and Cubot, Dr. Eggman's henchbots, go into the room, carrying mops and buckets of soapy water. Orbot notices Big in one of the submarines.

"Hey!" he yelled. "Get out of Eggman's shrinking submarine!"

"Shrinking submarine?" Big questioned.

"Yeah!" Cubot answered. "It's a submarine that can shrink! It can even fly, and it has a built-in pizza oven!"

Orbot smacks Cubot in the back of the head.

"That's what it does, huh?" said Big. "Maybe I can find Froggy with this!" He turns on the shrinking submarine, and it shrinks to the size of a flu virus. Big takes the wheel and flies off.

In the sub was a voice-activated GPS. Big thought it would help him find Froggy, so he tells it, "Help me find Froggy!"

The sub goes on autopilot and heads to where Froggy is. The sub ended up going to Amy Rose's house. In it, Amy is sleeping on the couch with her usual dress on.

"Is this where Froggy is?" said Big.

The GPS detected Froggy to be inside Amy. Luckily, at Big's size, he can enter her easily. Any idea on where to go?

The species were the Microuman, Humanoid-like race that lived in a comet. Said comet was doomed to crash on Mobius' moon so the population initiated an massive exodus into the world itself.

They had an interesting symbiotic culture with other alien creatures, almost borderline parasitic but due to their micro size and low requirement of consumsion, they take very little of their host.

"Very well, Call the Exodus Fleet, we have found a situable host." Said the Admiral on command.

"Negative, Number One." The Admiral said "We're to wait the fleet, until then, let's send out probes and see location for settlement." He then nods to the science officers on the consoles.

"Launching Probes, sir." One of then said.

The Probes were launched and went to the Unaware titaness rabbit, as she went to do her chores, some went throught her nose, ears and mouth but some went throught her clothing and skin and eventually, bloodstream.

"We have visuals sir."

The Main screen shows an aged Microuman male in profesional clothing however this Microuman was the very president and leader of the entire fleet that confound their entirely of their species' survival.

"M-Mister President!" The entirely of the bridge saluted

"At ease, gentlemen. Admiral, I see you had found an situable host."

"Yes, as you can see, this female is perfectly situable host for our species survival, we had data that proves our finding with the probes and science teams and pinpointed several locations that might be situable for our civilization.."

"I see.. please, Share the Information with the New Future so we can review the data ourselves."

"At once, Mister President, Ensign?"

"Done, Admiral."

The President of the Microumans looked thoughtful but then nodded. "She is indeed a situable host, Good Work." The Crewmember had a relief and smiles in their faces as tension dropped off in a instant.

"Will you do the Honor on beginning the Colonization efford?"

"But of course, Sir, we begin with the operation, shortly!"

"Good, Carry on and we'll follow, New Future out." and then the feed cut leaving again with the image of their new unaware home..

info.brief_description: For those endo fetish fans who wanted to add a little anime to the mix, you're welcome.
info.description:
This interactive will combine 3 things: Giantesses, anime, and Endo.

Endo is a sub fetish, usually of giantess, in which a human is shrunk to near microscopic size and travels around inside a normal sized human's body. Think Fantastic Voyage. So, in all my perverted thoughts, I J.M.Darkly have built this into a giantess anime story. This is more experimental than anything else so rules are as follows.

Rules:

1) Use good grammar. If I can't read it or it doesn't make sense I will delete.
2) You can use underage characters, but do not put them in sexual situations.
3) Only female giantesses.
4) Go nuts. I want to see what you guys can do with this.

4/8/2015: I have changed the name of this interactive so that we can include more stuff. Now, you no longer are limited to only anime. You use videogames, comics, live action stuff, anything you want.

The link to the video game and others section: http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1980225-Endo-Chronicles/map/1553322...

Also, I am including one more rule. Recently, myself and another write have started a story line that has bugs invading the bodies of giantesses to mess with them. It has come to my attention that some readers may find this disturbing. As such should any new chapter include such content, I ask that the chapter title end with this symbol: *. This is to warn readers what they are getting into and to turn back if they don't wish to read about bugs doing endo. Thank you.
